Articles.Content:
Just thought I'd share my first colossal ship.

It is still under a lot of work and it is far from being completed.

I already crashed the game about 10 times while building this thing, lol. Still more crashes to come. It's getting quite laggy too.

I predict it won't be very pretty when I attach the rockets to leave the atmosphere but it will get rid of them.

If I ever get successful in putting this thing in orbit, it will become my main ship. It will have ridiculous amounts of fuel and energy, it will be the main Kethane storage unit and maybe it will be able carry miners, probes and rovers.
